properties.body:
GULF OF GUINEA.
TOGO.
PIRACY.
1. M/V BW RHINE POSSIBLY HIJACKED IN 06-01.14N 001-20.20E
   ON 28 APR. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR
   OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   TELEX: MA 34199, PHONE: 603 2031 0014,
   FAX: 603 2078 5769, E-MAIL: PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 925/12.
